issue.title: [CF 937] Combat Event icon won't show if used pre-combat
issue.body:
IE I use a combat event icon to track the duration of my searing totem. If I drop it pre-combat and enter combat, the icon will not show.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #937 | Raw

comments.body:
